Zealots ferret out plots against their religion and seek justice for their church's followers. This zealot serves [Asmodeus](/Deities.aspx?ID=278), but others might serve [Abadar](/Deities.aspx?ID=277), [Calistria](/Deities.aspx?ID=279), [Iomedae](/Deities.aspx?ID=285), [Norgorber](/Deities.aspx?ID=289), [Pharasma](/Deities.aspx?ID=290), [Sarenrae](/Deities.aspx?ID=292), or [Zon-Kuthon](/Deities.aspx?ID=296). They often ride a [war horse](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3060) (Monster Core 201) wearing light [barding](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2778). To depict a zealot's mount, add this horse to the encounter as an additional monster with its own actions, adjusting the encounter's [XP budget](/Rules.aspx?ID=2717) accordingly. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 19 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14 [Zealot of Asmodeus](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3444) **Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 31 **Perception** +9 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) +9, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38) +10, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40) +10, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46) +12, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47) +7 **Str** +4 **Dex** +1 **Con** +1 **Int** +0 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +2 **Items** [Composite Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75) (20 arrows), [Half Plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=12), [Mace](/Weapons.aspx?ID=7), [Steel Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3) (Hardness 5, HP 20, BT 10) --- **AC** 22 (24 with shield raised) **Fort** +9 **Ref** +7 **Will** +11 **HP** 60 **[Shield Block](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=75)**
**Swear Vengeance **Trigger** A creature the zealot can see damages a follower of [Asmodeus](/Deities.aspx?ID=278) other than the zealot** **Effect** The zealot is affected by a [_sure strike_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1709) spell. If the zealot makes an attack roll against anyone other than the triggering creature, the _sure strike_ ends with no effect. --- **Speed** 20 feet **Melee** mace +12 ([Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193)), **Damage** 1d8+4 bludgeoning **Melee** fist +12 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)), **Damage** 1d4+4 bludgeoning **Ranged** composite shortbow +9 ([deadly 1d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)), **Damage** 1d6+2 piercing **Divine Prepared Spells** DC 19, attack +11 - **Cantrips (2nd)** [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Divine Lance](/Spells.aspx?ID=84), [Forbidding Ward](/Spells.aspx?ID=126), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Sigil](/Spells.aspx?ID=286) - **1st** [Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45), [Runic Weapon](/Spells.aspx?ID=1658), [Spirit Link](/Spells.aspx?ID=302) - **2nd** [Cleanse Affliction](/Spells.aspx?ID=1467), [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) (×4), [See the Unseen](/Spells.aspx?ID=1663), [Share Life](/Spells.aspx?ID=1669) **Channel Smite** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48)) **Cost** the zealot expends a [_harm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1552) spell; **Effect** The zealot makes a melee Strike. If it hits, they damage the target with a 1-action _harm_ spell. The target automatically gets a failure (or a critical failure if the Strike was a critical hit). The spell doesn't have the [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645) trait when cast this way. **Deadly Simplicity** The zealot deals 1d8 damage with their mace instead of 1d6.
